New Records: Jared Jones became just the seventh Pirate rookie to eclipse 125 strikeouts in a season.
Key Match Events: Jared Jones allowed a pair of home runs and a season-high matching six earned runs in a 7-1 Pirates loss to the Reds.
Ty France hit a two-run shot to center off Jones' curveball.
Elly De La Cruz hit a three-run shot off Jones' slider.
Post-Match Reflections: Jared Jones confirmed there was no injury despite a scare in the fifth inning.
Jones reflected on his performance, stating 'Terrible. Everything was terrible today.'
Manager Derek Shelton commented on Jones' inconsistency and the challenges of his first Major League season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on a muggy afternoon on the banks of the Ohio River, which may have affected Jones' performance.
